tool_description:
List of free video games currently available. Data includes dates, discount types (xbox game pass, free, etc), platforms, images, and much more.

The list is updated daily to always have the latest data.

The endpoint is paginated and can be sorted and filtered by most of its fields. You can also get the detail of an individual document.
name: Actual free games
title: Actual free games

api_list.name: List free video games
api_list.description: Current list of free videogames with pagination. You can filter and sort by most of your fields.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: You can sort by any field. To sort DECV add \\\"-\\\" at start. Example: `-name`.

optional_parameters.name: platforms
optional_parameters.description:
You can add multiple platforms separe it by \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\".
Example: `xbox,mac,windows`.

api_list.name: Detail free video game
api_list.description: Detail of a free video game by id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://actual-free-games1.p.rapidapi.com/448"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "actual-free-games1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://actual-free-games1.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "actual-free-games1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
